bluetooth is not a good idea for messengers, since it canâ€™t be nearly as instant. of course iâ€™m not fully opposed, i think Briar is a good project, but i think they will always be inferior to mesh networks like meshtasitc/meshcore.
it is however a good idea for a social media, since there slow propegation isnâ€™t an issue, which is why i love SSB and am sad that it failed.
